elements: The dim premises of Miss Morland, who deals in rare and sometimes dangerous books.
Oriflamme's specialises in curios, perfumes, taxidermy specimens, and rare texts. It operates from cramped new premises, now, since the destruction of the old by an unexplained fire.
A cabaret with an occult reputation.
Our business is private. We could use somewhere more secret. [That's not available in this build, though.]
Place a Follower in here to convert them, permanently, into a Prisoner.
